messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] New here :)
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome, Vera!  Man, would I like to trade places with you (living places, that is) !!  I m in Maryland, USA, and it s hotter than he## here!  I have a passion
messages.messageBody:
Welcome, Vera! Man, would I like to trade places with you (living places, that is) !! I'm in Maryland, USA, and it's hotter than he## here! I have a passion for the English countryside--would love to get back there and visit someday! My family and I visited Yorkshire, specifically Harrogate, when I was 13.

How did you find out about unschooling? I'm always curious how people come about it. :)

~Melissa :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Vera Lothian
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, August 21, 2009 5:02 AM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] New here :)


hello,

I joined the list a little while ago and been so busy I haven't
introduced myself yet.
My name is Vera, married to James we have 3 boys (5y/o and 2y/o twins)
I'm Dutch hubby is British and we live in the English countryside in a
tiny English house.

Look forward to joining your list :)

Vera
